column3:
Tested ACK.

One minor nit is the way the "found" bit caps out at found==required. I _think_ removing the "&& nFound < nRequired" clause in the for loop should be safe; the nFound > nRequired part at the end should never be triggered. But just documenting it would be safer.

> One minor nit is the way the "found" bit caps out at found==required. I think removing the "&& nFound < nRequired" clause in the for loop should be safe; the nFound > nRequired part at the end should never be triggered. But just documenting it would be safer.\n\nI've thought about cloning the `IsSuperMajority` in rpcblockhain.cpp, with that change, leaving the original one as-is. It is only a fe
Now we have the soft fork states between `pruned` and `prunehight` which looks a bit sandwiched. \n
